title: Two CLEAN, Two CREAM'D
body_text:
At around noon, Thursday, February 7, "The Writer" sent the following message regarding the mega Season 13 midway showdown:
"... RYAN LETSCHE & LAUREN STOPA vs. GRANT CORNERO & LAUREN WINSTON in a 'CREAMation Rules'  Match!"
...................
The stipulaton, the
Female Titans
, the male megastars tell to the enormity of this crucial mid-season showdown!
RYAN LETSCHE & LAUREN STOPA take on
GRANT CORNERO & LAUREN WINSTON
in the
CREAMation 5
!
Stopa vs. Winston
It took almost
24 months
for these two to collide, and it sure as hell did not disappoint. But unfortunately  for the tough as nails "UnSTOPAble One", her quest to capture her first victory went stale and it was Lauren Winston who gained the upper hand. Stopa has a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to return the favor and you can guarantee her mental and physical preparation heading in to her first mid-season main event.
Letsche vs. Cornero
On a cold, bitter January night, 2007
ROOKIE of the Year
Cornero defeated the legendary Ryan Letsche at the
Season 12 Finale
. It's a loss that has haunted the innovative catching phenom ever since. At DODGEBALL 125:
CREAMation 5
, Letsche seeks the ultimate vindication while risking the public embarrassment of being "blinded by the white".
DODGEBALL 125 hits Wall High School, February 9.
And what an unforgivable sin it would be if missed out on this blockbuster.
CREAMation Rules
History Section
..
DODGEBALL LXXXI
..
DODGEBALL 91
..
DODGEBALL 105
..
DODGEBALL 116
body_html:
At around noon, Thursday, February 7, "The Writer" sent the following message regarding the mega Season 13 midway showdown:

"... RYAN LETSCHE & LAUREN STOPA vs. GRANT CORNERO & LAUREN WINSTON in a 'CREAMation Rules' Match!"

...................

The stipulaton, the Female Titans, the male megastars tell to the enormity of this crucial mid-season showdown!

RYAN LETSCHE & LAUREN STOPA take on
GRANT CORNERO & LAUREN WINSTON
in the CREAMation 5!

Stopa vs. Winston
It took almost 24 months for these two to collide, and it sure as hell did not disappoint. But unfortunately for the tough as nails "UnSTOPAble One", her quest to capture her first victory went stale and it was Lauren Winston who gained the upper hand. Stopa has a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to return the favor and you can guarantee her mental and physical preparation heading in to her first mid-season main event.

Letsche vs. Cornero
On a cold, bitter January night, 2007 ROOKIE of the Year Cornero defeated the legendary Ryan Letsche at the Season 12 Finale. It's a loss that has haunted the innovative catching phenom ever since. At DODGEBALL 125: CREAMation 5, Letsche seeks the ultimate vindication while risking the public embarrassment of being "blinded by the white".


DODGEBALL 125 hits Wall High School, February 9.
And what an unforgivable sin it would be if missed out on this blockbuster.

.. DODGEBALL LXXXI .. DODGEBALL 91 .. DODGEBALL 105 .. DODGEBALL 116
